title: Which Jungler?
body:
Now, before you say anything, yes, i did do a poll maybe a week ago asking you guys if vi or aatrox were good jglers, and vi ended up winning... But people have told me there are better jglers, and with that matter, I have decided on 4 champs (still including vi and aatrox) 

Those following are...
Vi
Aatrox
Rengar
Nocturne 

Please comment and vote in which one you think is the most worth champ... Mainly looking for jgler tier btw... But a toplaner/jgler would be fine :D 

Thanks again

replies.body: Currently I would actually recommend Nidalee and Elise, props the too best jungles right now, however with the upcoming mr item buffs it could change

Overall if you want one guy to main from Bronze to Diamond go Rengar, he's really strong in all elos. There's some simplicity to him kit making him easy to understand but also some really complex tactics you can pull off. He can play top and jungle really well too.

Vi is really nice jungle but no so good top, apart from that same as Rengar.

Aatrox is pretty trash unless you go devourer or something.

Nocturne can be good, his top lane is actually stronger than people think.

TL;DR
Pick Rengar

Thanks for the reply! 
Tbh, I play league for fun, not ranked, so I don't really care or not if he/she gets me to diamond, I don't play ranked anyway...
Help! Vi and rengar are even, and I just can't decide... Please keep commenting, it really helps!

I main {{champion:107}} and he is honestly THE BEST THING. If you know how to pull of the 5 ferocity ult combo you can easily 1 shot almost anyone (except tanks) and his kit is simple once you learn it.
